about.subtitle: — Building unity through arts, sports, and community since {year}
about.ourStoryP1: {clubName} began over {years} years ago as a humble initiative in {village} village. It started with a small group of children and their parents, supported wholeheartedly by the village community. What emerged from that grassroots effort is today a thriving organization that brings together people of all ages—children, youth, elders, men, and women—to grow, learn, and serve together.
about.ourStoryP2: The club was officially registered in {year}, formalizing our commitment to the village. Through arts, sports, education, and community service, we continue to strengthen the bonds that make {village} a vibrant place to live.
about.ourValuesIntro: Our foundation rests on principles that transcend divisions. We believe that when people come together without barriers, great things happen.
about.noPoliticsDesc: We remain independent of any political party. Our focus is solely on community and village welfare.
about.noReligionDesc: Everyone is equal here. We welcome all, regardless of religion, caste, or background.
about.unityDiversityDesc: Children, youth, elders, men, and women—all growing together as one community.
about.ourMissionP: {clubName} is dedicated to serving {village} village. From blood donation drives and job connections to educational resources and cultural events, we work to make our village a better place for everyone. We will continue this work with the same spirit of unity and service for generations to come.
about.establishedDesc: ~{years} years ago — Started with children and village support
